s: I have been trying so hard to get Twins gloves, but its impossible in the US due to their trademark issues. Hesitantly, got these, but I can confirm these are LEGIT! The hand compartment is snug and you might have to use the gloves a few times to break it in, but after that, these are amazing amazing for sparring!! ... After trying several others these have become my favorite brand...
